judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed ou the opinion of Judge Reno,
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Franklin F. Barr, Assistant Distinct Attorney, with him John II. Maurer, District Attorney, and J. Herman Kahn, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Chalfant, Appellant.
Argued April 9, 1945.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Paul Reilly, for appellant.
Franklin F. Barr, Assistant Distinct Attorney, with him John II. Maurer, District Attorney, and J. Herman Kahn, for appellee.
May 21, 1945:
